TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XpsException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for exceptions that are thrown by the XML Paper Specification (XPS) packaging and serialization APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the `innerException` parameter is not `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the current exception is thrown in a `catch` block that handles the inner exception.
